import {cartInfo} from "../../data/cart"; import "./cart.css"; const Cart = () => { return (
Your Shopping Cart
{cartInfo.map(item =>
Title: {item.title}
Author: {item.author}
{item.quantity}
${item.price * item.quantity}
)}
Order Summary
Subtotal ${cartInfo.reduce((acc,cur) => acc + current.price * cur.quantity, 0)}
); } export default Cart;
